title: 6. IRRI Agronomy Challenge: Rat and Bird Control (13 January 2012)

tasks.task: Discuss rat and bird control for the rice field.
subtasks: Assess the unevenness of the field and consider possible causes.
Describe the use of a trap crop (earlier planted area) for rat management.
Explain the effectiveness of timing rat control measures to coincide with the breeding cycle.
Identify areas within the field that serve as rat habitats (e.g., irrigation canals).
Demonstrate and explain how rats use openings in structures (e.g., trap examples with Trappy).
Reflect on initial concerns regarding pests (rats) versus later issues (birds).
Mention methods for bird deterrence, such as visual flags and noise (rachet windmill).
Identify challenges in controlling bird populations (e.g., unknown breeding grounds and aggregated areas).
